title: iRecipe
description: iRecipe is a real-world front-end application recipe and food image generator app that provides users with access to a large collection of recipes and corresponding images, including international dishes.

title: Team-Profile-Generator
description: This is a Node.js command line interface application built to help generate a useful basic profile based on the information given by the user.

title: Password-Generator
description: This is a JavaScript (JS) code that produces a random password generator based on the users input

title: Planner-App
description: a simple calendar application that allows a user to save events for each hour of the day

title: Quiz
description: This is an a simple interactive coding quiz , created to test users knowledge on basic JavaScript topic .
